title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and SDK for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to talk to Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LLM interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Self-hosted ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chat, file upload, and admin panel.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI that adds conversation memory and prompt templates to Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings Ollama-powered code completion and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images and Docker Compose stacks for CPU & GPU inference.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app using Next.js and the ollama-js client for private LLM chats.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that sends selected notes to an Ollama model for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or rankers in pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository showing how to build a RAG system with Ollama, ChromaDB, and LangChain.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API with TypeScript support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Lightweight Java SDK for Ollama supporting synchronous and asynchronous chat/generate calls.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing ergonomic bindings to the Ollama REST API with Tokio async.

title: ollama-go
summary: Go client library for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for the Ollama Python client (mirror of ollama-python repo).

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News discussion thread announcing Ollama v0.1 with 100+ comments on local LLM tooling.
